about_the_game:
Hotwives on Holiday is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel focusing on the friendship and rivalry of two sexy married women. You play as an observer of two sexy women on vacation. You make decisions along the way that affect them both.

Your journey will be filled with comedy, drama, and lots of sex.

Jasmine has a permanent Hall Pass from her husband, which means that she is allowed to sleep with other men. Her friend, Callie does not have such an arrangement. She prefers to just cheat on her husband. When the two women go on a vacation to Cancún, they discover each other's secrets.

Callie says that what her husband doesn't know won't hurt him, as she indulges in several flings while on vacation. Jasmine insists that it's better to live life as a Hotwife, and has an agreement with her husband that she is allowed to have as many sexual encounters as she likes, as long as she tells him about it.

Each insists that their way of having extra-marital flings is the better way.

It's up to you to guide them in this adventure of Hotwife sex and Cheating Wife sex.

After several encounters for both ladies, they learn which method is best - cheating or being a Hotwife with a Hall Pass.

Hotwives on Holiday features:

  • Over 1000 images

  • 2-4 hours of game

  • An engaging story

  • Music

  • Plenty of lewd scenes with the two women

There are plenty of twists and turns for both ladies and for you as the player.
